timeline.bodyText:
Yeah... I didn't mean to deprecate per-channel-adapter URL configuration.
My idea was just to deprecate a getUrl() since it not always reflect a connection reality.
Since we have now that MqttConnectOptions getConnectionInfo() may be it is better to clone its instance and modify its serverURIs with the provided URL. So, we still can keep existing apps without respective modification for per-channel-adapter-client-factory.
WDYT?

replies.bodyText:
Oh, you're right - need to rethink.
The reason is if you want to connect to a cluster, the only way you can do it is via the connect options - here I am restoring the functionality, but enhanced to allow cluster per adapter with a single factory.
